title: 2000/221/EC: Council Decision of 13 March 2000 appointing a Greek alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 13 March 2000
appointing a Greek alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
(2000/221/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 26 January 1998(1) appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions,
Whereas:
A seat as an alternate member of the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the death of Mr Philippos Amiridis, a Greek member, as notified to the Council on 7 February 2000,
Having regard to the proposal from the Greek Government,
main_body: Mr Mihail Stylianidis shall be appointed an alternate member of the Committee of the Regions to replace Mr Philippos Amiridis for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which runs until 25 January 2002.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 March 2000.
For the Council
The President
J. PINA MOURA
(1) OJ L 28, 4.2.1998, p. 19.
